price: Namna hivi anakubainishieni Mwenyezi Mungu Aya zake ili mpate kufahamu.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ
footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu anakubainishieni hukumu zake, na neema zake, na Aya zake, kwa mfano wa bayana hizi na Sharia hizi zilizo wazi zenye kuleta maslaha, ili mpate kuzingatia na mpate kutenda yaliyo kheri.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: kadhālika yubayyinu al-lahu lakum āyātihi laʿallakum taʿqilūna
